item.title: By: Toby Reid
item.dc:creator: Toby Reid
item.description: Hi Matt, Love your stuff, please get in touch if you're ever in Sydney. I'm currently doing web development but getting more into interactive visualisations during the weekend as a hobby, hopefully 'performing' soon. Regards, Toby
item.content:encoded:
Hi Matt,
Love your stuff, please get in touch if you’re ever in Sydney. I’m currently doing web development but getting more into interactive visualisations during the weekend as a hobby, hopefully ‘performing’ soon.
Regards,
Toby
